fields.name: Features:
fields.value:
- 502: Saint will always spawn
- Factional chat
- No factional kill until the Saint dies
- Hallow members can gain "Saint points", which the Saint requires X of to transform into the much stronger Paragon, where X is the number of other living Hallow members. The Town will be notified that the Hallow has awakened their god when the Saint transforms.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who object to the Hallow's will.
